message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I really appreciate you considering me!  I'm interested but I'm only able to go up to $85 at this time.  What do you think?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $95. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I really appreciate you coming down in price, but unfortunately, I'm still not able to go higher than $85. I'd be happy to close the deal at that price.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still not willing to go up to $95, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $90. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
